scripts.bundle:build-webpack: yarn run clean:bundle && yarn run build:graphql && yarn run build:cpx && yarn run build:tsc --build && yarn run bundle:webpack
scripts.bundle:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn run bundle:build-webpack --config configs/webpack/development.ts
scripts.bundle:development:local:watch: yarn run clean:bundle && concurrently --kill-others --names "graphql,cpx,tsc,webpack" "yarn run build:graphql --watch" "yarn run build:cpx --watch" "yarn run build:tsc --watch" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=local yarn run bundle:webpack --watch --config configs/webpack/development.ts"
scripts.bundle:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn run bundle:build-webpack --config configs/webpack/production.ts
scripts.serve:development: yarn run env:cmd-cross NODE_ENV=development node dist/main.js
scripts.serve:production: yarn run env:cmd-cross NODE_ENV=production node dist/main.js
scripts.start:local: yarn run bundle:production:local && yarn run serve:local
scripts.start:test: yarn run bundle:production:test && yarn run serve:test
scripts.start:staging: yarn run bundle:production:staging && yarn run serve:staging
scripts.start:live: yarn run bundle:production:live && yarn run serve:live
scripts.debug:development: yarn run env:cmd-cross NODE_ENV=development ndb node dist/main.js
scripts.debug:production: yarn run env:cmd-cross NODE_ENV=production ndb node dist/main.js
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:bundle && yarn run clean:build && yarn run clean:dumps && yarn run clean:local
scripts.clean:dumps: shx rm -rf dumps/* && shx touch dumps/.gitkeep
scripts.clean:local: shx rm -rf local/docker/* && shx touch local/docker/.gitkeep && shx rm -rf local/tmp/* && shx touch local/tmp/.gitkeep && shx rm -rf local/uploads/* && shx touch local/uploads/.gitkeep
